name: Journey for Wife
description:
———– HOW TO PLAY ——————————————

SPACE TO JUMP

← → TO MOVE

"X" TO ATTACK

This is a platformer. The game is based on a legend journey of Izanagi to Yomi, the land of the dead. Izanagi wants to return his wife before she tastes food from the dead.

Well, I hope we will finish the game.

———– THE STORY ————————————————

Izanagi's wife is dead. He is going to Yomi, The Land of the Roots and Dead, to find and return his love!

If you like the game, please rate it in Ludum https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/journey-for-wife

Music assets

Birth of a Hero by Benjamin Tissot from bensound.com

Static Scream from zapsplat.com
